<<<<<<< HEAD
A remonstrance and resolution of the Kingdom of Scotland. Shewing the lawfulnesse of the second coming into England to take up arms against all those that shall oppose the Parliament. Published with the advise of the Councell of Scotland. Lawfulnesse of our expedition into England manifested. Scotland. Army. Scotland. Parliament.
[2], 6 p.
Printed first in Scotland by Robert Bryson, and now reprinted at London for G. T., [London] : 1642.
Originally published as: The lawfulnesse of our expedition into England manifested. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug. 13:". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======

Originally published as: The lawfulnesse of our expedition into England manifested. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Aug. 13:". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
